message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The symptoms suggest migraine headaches, and among the options, only Propranolol is used for prophylaxis of migraine headaches. Fluoxetine is used for depression, and Ergotamine and Sumatriptan are used for acute treatment of migraines.

Fluoxetine is used for depression and anxiety but not specifically for migraines. Ergotamine and Sumatriptan are abortive medications used for acute treatment of migraines.

Propranolol is used as a long-term prophylaxis for migraine headaches. Ergotamine and sumatriptan are abortive therapies used during an acute attack, while fluoxetine is not indicated for migraine headaches.
